participant_1.background:
I have turned my passion for juice into a business.
connor mcgregor is my favorite fighter.
My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner.
I came to know my family by growing up with them.
i love hiking and staying fit.

participant_2.background:
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.
I am unmarried and I enjoy my freedom.
I spent time with my family and enjoyed the local culture.
I'm just trying to live my life and be happy.

content.text: Hey there! What's up?
Not much, just working out. What about you?
Just got done with work. I love working with food, but I'm not so sure if I want to do this for a career.
What do you like about working with food?
I like making things that people enjoy. It's really satisfying to see people happy when they eat something I've made.
I can relate to that. I love making music and seeing people enjoy it.
What kind of music do you make?
I make techno music. It's really intense and energetic.
I've never listened to techno before, but I'm always open to new things. Do you have any music I can listen to?
Sure, here's a link to my soundcloud.
Cool, I'll check it out. Thanks!
No problem. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music. I listen to a lot of rock and hip-hop, but I also like some electronic music.
Cool. I like a lot of different kinds of music too. I like to explore new genres and find new artists.
Me too. I think it's important to keep an open mind about music. You never know what you might find.
Exactly. I've found some of my favorite music by just exploring new genres.
Me too. I've found some really great music by just listening to random playlists on Spotify.
Spotify is great for finding new music. I've found a lot of new artists that I love on there.
Me too. I love the discover weekly playlist. It always has some great new music for me to listen to.
I love that playlist too. It's always a good surprise.
Yeah. It's like getting a present every week.
Exactly. It's the best.
